"use client"; import {useState} from "react"; import {Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle} from "@/components/ui/card"; import {Button} from "@/components/ui/button"; import {Input} from "@/components/ui/input"; import {Label} from "@/components/ui/label"; import {Switch} from "@/components/ui/switch"; import {Select, SelectContent, SelectItem, SelectTrigger, SelectValue} from "@/components/ui/select"; import {Tabs, TabsContent, TabsList, TabsTrigger} from "@/components/ui/tabs"; import {Badge} from "@/components/ui/badge"; import {BellIcon, DatabaseIcon, PrinterIcon, FloppyDiskIcon, ScalesIcon, BarbellIcon,} from "@phosphor-icons/react"; import {FAB} from "@/components/ui/fab"; export default function Settings() { const tabs = [ { id: "weighing", label: "Pesagem", icon: BarbellIcon, }, { id: "scales", label: "Balanças", icon: ScalesIcon, }, { id: "notifications", label: "Notificações", icon: BellIcon, }, { id: "backup", label: "Backup", icon: DatabaseIcon, }, { id: "printing", label: "Impressão", icon: PrinterIcon, } ] const [settings, setSettings] = useState({ // Configurações de Pesagem weighing: { autoTare: true, minWeight: "100", maxWeight: "50000", precision: "0.1", timeout: "300", printTicket: true, }, // Configurações de Sistema system: { companyName: "Semensol Professional", address: "Rua das Plantações, 123", city: "Ribeirão Preto - SP", phone: "(16) 3333-4444", email: "contato@semensol.com.br", cnpj: "12.345.678/0001-90", }, // Configurações de Balanças scales: { scale1: { name: "Balança R1", ip: "192.168.1.100", port: "502", enabled: true, calibration: "2024-01-15", }, scale2: { name: "Balança R2", ip: "192.168.1.101", port: "502", enabled: false, calibration: "2024-01-15", }, }, // Configurações de Notificações notifications: { emailAlerts: true, systemAlerts: true, weighingComplete: true, scaleOffline: true, dailyReport: true, weeklyReport: false, }, // Configurações de Backup backup: { autoBackup: true, backupTime: "02:00", retentionDays: "30", cloudBackup: false, }, // Configurações de Impressão printing: { printerName: "HP LaserJet Pro", ticketFormat: "standard", copies: "2", autoprint: true, }, }); const handleSave = () => { // Implementar lógica de salvamento console.log("Configurações salvas:", settings); }; const updateSetting = (category: string, key: string, value: any) => { setSettings(prev => ({ ...prev, [category]: { ...prev[category], [key]: value } })); }; return (

Configurações

Gerencie as configurações do sistema

{tabs.map((tab) => ( {tab.label} ))} Configurações de Pesagem
updateSetting("weighing", "minWeight", e.target.value)} />
updateSetting("weighing", "maxWeight", e.target.value)} />
updateSetting("weighing", "timeout", e.target.value)} />
updateSetting("weighing", "autoTare", checked)} />
updateSetting("weighing", "printTicket", checked)} />
Configurações de Balanças {Object.entries(settings.scales).map(([scaleKey, scaleData]) => (
{scaleData.name} {scaleData.enabled ? "Ativa" : "Inativa"}
updateSetting("scales", `${scaleKey}.enabled`, checked)} />
))} Configurações de Notificações {Object.entries(settings.notifications).map(([key, value]) => (
updateSetting("notifications", key, checked)} />
))} Configurações de Backup
updateSetting("backup", "autoBackup", checked)} />
updateSetting("backup", "backupTime", e.target.value)} />
updateSetting("backup", "retentionDays", e.target.value)} />
updateSetting("backup", "cloudBackup", checked)} />
Configurações de Impressão
updateSetting("printing", "printerName", e.target.value)} />
updateSetting("printing", "autoprint", checked)} />
); }

"use client"; import {useState} from "react"; import {Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle} from "@/components/ui/card"; import {Button} from "@/components/ui/button"; import {Input} from "@/components/ui/input"; import {Label} from "@/components/ui/label"; import {Select, SelectContent, SelectItem, SelectTrigger, SelectValue,} from "@/components/ui/select"; import {CheckCircleIcon, ClockIcon, PlayIcon, PlugsConnectedIcon, ScalesIcon, SquareIcon, PlugsIcon, BarbellIcon,} from "@phosphor-icons/react"; import {cn} from "@/lib/utils"; import {Badge} from "@/components/ui/badge"; export default function WeighingPage() { const [isConnected, setIsConnected] = useState(false); const [currentWeight, setCurrentWeight] = useState(0); const [isWeighing, setIsWeighing] = useState(false); return (

Central de Pesagem

Controle e monitoramento das operações de pesagem em tempo real

Controle da Balança
{currentWeight.toLocaleString('pt-BR')} kg
{isConnected ? ( <> Conectado ) : ( <> Desconectado )}
Status do Sistema
Balança Principal {isConnected ? "Online" : "Offline"}
Última Pesagem 14:32
Pesagens Hoje 127
); }

"use client"; import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from "@/components/ui/card"; import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"; import { Input } from "@/components/ui/input"; import { Label } from "@/components/ui/label"; import { Select, SelectContent, SelectItem, SelectTrigger, SelectValue, } from "@/components/ui/select"; import { Filter, X } from "lucide-react"; interface FilterState { startDate: string; endDate: string; driver: string; company: string; cargoType: string; plate: string; } interface FiltersCardProps { filters: FilterState; setFilters: (filters: FilterState) => void; onClearFilters: () => void; } export function FiltersCard({ filters, setFilters, onClearFilters }: FiltersCardProps) { return ( Filtros
setFilters({ ...filters, startDate: e.target.value }) } />
setFilters({ ...filters, endDate: e.target.value }) } />
setFilters({ ...filters, plate: e.target.value }) } />
setFilters({ ...filters, driver: e.target.value }) } />
); }
